channel.title: Help please just a lil error i need help with
channel.description:
[code]client.java:9754: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
yea its probably simple lol, but i dont get it =S

item.title: Help please just a lil error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“wc4evandeva, post:11, topic:222762”][quote author=_Vengeance link=topic=292578.msg2356272#msg2356272 date=1217323103]
Wow… Just wow…
That is disgusting, just that little block of code.
I would hate to see the rest.

Again, I repeat - don’t declare methods inside other methods.
[/quote]

Im almost positive he dont know what a method is and That coding is pretty nasty its all like
} ]
Ill throw somehere }}}
and here ]
maybe a few here
} } ]]}}AND SOME CODE HERE addobject } }}[some more stuf here[/quote]

I’m almost positive you don’t know what you’re talking about so shut up.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please just a lil error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“dizzy hobo, post:6, topic:222762”][quote author=wc4evandeva link=topic=292578.msg2356248#msg2356248 date=1217322379]
Uhm can you post the stuff around that maybe 10 lines up and 10 lines below it. It will help a lot.
[/quote]

                            [code]sendMessage(
                                            "Successfully loaded backup file, you may need to logout and in to see changes.");
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    } 
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            } 

        }

    }
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
if (amount > 0) {
if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0) {
if (!takeAsNote) {
if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot] - 1]) {
if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot] - 1), amount)) {
bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}
} else {
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot] - 1),
bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}[/code][/quote]
I press tab randomly too.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please just a lil error i need help with
item.dc:creator: @dizzy_hobo dizzy hobo
item.description:
@dizzy_hobo wrote:

wc4evandeva:

Uhm can you post the stuff around that maybe 10 lines up and 10 lines below it. It will help a lot.

                            [code]sendMessage(
                                            "Successfully loaded backup file, you may need to logout and in to see changes.");
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    } 
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
            } 

        }

    }
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
if (amount > 0) {
if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0) {
if (!takeAsNote) {
if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot] - 1]) {
if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot] - 1), amount)) {
bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}
} else {
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot] - 1),
bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}[/code]
